website_summaries.verdict: The tips are of good quality, but the fact that set contents aren't standardized makes other brands more appealing.
pros: 56-piece set includes a great selection of standard tips, two flower nails, a coupler, and a plastic storage case
cons: Tip selection may vary from set to set

customer_reviews.title: Durable, every tip you need...
customer_reviews.text: This gives me every decorating tip that I need to decorate my cakes. It even comes with a tip to make my pate a choux. All the tips are made durable. I've been looking for a reasonably priced tip set and I've found it. These tips are great. I can now start making my roses again. These are great for the begining decorator to the advanced. I Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Corby

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I'm brand new to cake decorating. I bought this set to start playing with buttercream techniques as a fun hobby. For my purposes, it's fantastic. I've had a great time experimenting and "playing" in the kitchen with friends. I've had no problems with these tips at all. They are each labeled except the big tips, which helped a huge amount. Bottom line: I can't speak to how well this would work for professional use, but it's a phenomenal starter set.
customer_reviews.author: SDVTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a great set that came with the storage box. Make it neat and tidy to store. It has a no. marked on each one. The reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it do not have a chart to indicate the outcome of each pattern. It worth to keep a set for baking lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Bo Au

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage box - wish they were numbered in the box but are on each tip
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I love the coupler that was included as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally review items, but this really is worth it. You won't regret this purchase. The kit is well made and packaged well; these will last for a long time. I love the coupler that was included as well as the cleaning brush which will make clean up a breeze. Love, love, love. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time and they are great. Professional tips.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this set because it had every tip needed to ...

I recently used this set to decorate a birthday cake, a hundred cupcakes and cookies for my grandniece's first birthday. The case held every tip in place which was helpful because it easily fit in my backpack when I flew down to California for the celebration. It is a great set and recommend it highly.

customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of decorating tips. It's great because they come in a case to keep them all organized. The tips are numbered, so it's easy to look online to see what kind of decorating you can do with each tip. I haven't used them yet, but cannot wait to!!!

customer_reviews.title: A nice variety.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter's first set. It's a nice variety but didn't include a diagram showing the actual designs. Luckily, I bought one from Wilton at the same time, but not all in the set matched, making it a trial & error experience. This may not cause a problem for the experienced baker.

customer_reviews.title: A professional would approve

customer_reviews.title: Okay for casual use

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Love how it come in the little ...

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!

product_meta.title: 56 PCS Stainless Steel Icing Tips Pastry Tool for All Cakes, Lava Cakes and Cupcakes Decorations, Hinged Storage Box(HK101-1) Included
product_meta.description: Size:HK101-1KitchenPROP is a North American supplier of quality home and professional tools KitchenPROP is proud to supply quality built specialty-baking tools renowned for their high quality The KitchenPROP Stainless Steel Icing Tips Numbered Cake Decorating Kit will help explore your creative side with the art of cake decoration Decorate different cakes for all sorts of celebration events such as Mother's Day special holidays birthdays parties and much more Features 52 different decorative tips Plastic hinged-box for easy storage Tip brush for cleaning Numbered for following cake design instructions Great gift for Mother's Day birthday anniversary Includes - Stainless steel decorating piping tips 48 Pcs (Number 1 2 3 4 5 6 8 9 10 12 17 18 20 21 22 26 27 28 29 30 46 48 54 59 61 62 67 68 69 70 71 74 78 81 96 97 98 101 103 104 106 154 158 353 363 7051 7052 7086) 4 Big tips (M112 M172 M341 and M853) 2 Flower nails 1 Standard cluster 1 Cleaning Brush
feature_bullets: ★VERSATILE COLLECTION: 48 pcs Stainless Steel decorating piping tips plus 4 Big tips, 2 flower nails, 1 standard coupler and 1 cleaning Brush to help you create the most stunning cake decoration seamlessly.

★EASY TO USE DECORATING TIPS FOR AMATEURS AND PROFESSIONALS: Surprise your guests and loved ones with these lavish cupcakes handmade by you! Beginners enjoy the ease of making beautiful cupcakes while professionals love the endless possibilities of creativity!
★STAINLESS STEEL DESIGN: Made from Food Grade 304 Stainless Steel, these durable cake tips are reusable, non-stick, tasteless, easy to clean.
★STORAGE BOX: Includes a FREE Hinged plastic tray box for easy storage and organization. Comprehensive set of cake tips for cake decorating.

★NUMBERED CAKE TIPS: Each tip is numbered to make following baking instructions super easy. Whether baking is your hobby and passion, or your livelihood and profession, the KitchenPROP Cake Decoration Kit will satisfy all your needs!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars346 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
